scripts.all: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn create && yarn deploy
scripts.all:test: yarn codegen:test && yarn build:test && yarn create:test && yarn deploy:test
scripts.create: yarn prepare:main; graph create beamswap --node http://161.35.246.70:8020
scripts.deploy: yarn prepare:main; graph deploy beamswap --node http://161.35.246.70:8020 --ipfs http://161.35.246.70:5001
scripts.codegen:test: yarn prepare:test; graph codegen --output-dir src/types/; yarn prepare:test-end
scripts.build:test: yarn prepare:test; graph build; yarn prepare:test-end
scripts.create:test: yarn prepare:test; graph create beamswap --node http://161.35.246.70:8120; yarn prepare:test-end
scripts.deploy:test: yarn prepare:test; graph deploy beamswap --node http://161.35.246.70:8120 --ipfs http://161.35.246.70:5101; yarn prepare:test-end
scripts.prepare:test: mustache network.beamtest.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mv ./src/configs/config.ts ./src/configs/config.prd.ts && mv ./src/configs/config.beamtest.ts ./src/configs/config.ts
